body:
### Build fix: ###

Pass `-Dx11=True/False` ***only to older versions*** which ***support*** it.

### Fix tiff support: ###
The test of reading included tiff test file fails, when libtiff@4 is used:
Use the last version of libtiff with which it passes the tests.

While at it, bump to the current version of `gdk-pixbuf`.
title: gdk-pixbuf: Fix tiff support, fix build of '@2.42.2:', bump version
